name: Gnoll Demonfang
description: The Gnoll Demonfang is a medium humanoid with a blend of speed and strength, embodying chaotic evil. It has sharp claws and a fearsome demeanor.
memorable: The ability to transform into an ordinary gnoll when affected by certain spells, carrying over damage makes it both dangerous and unique.
goals: Typically seeks to spread chaos and evil, often attacking and dominating weaker creatures.
relations: Related to other gnolls, may be encountered with other chaotic or evil creatures.
environment: Often found in dark, chaotic environments or places tainted by evil.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity make it formidable in melee combat, with a special ability to attack multiple times.
weaknesses: Average Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma limit versatility and effectiveness in spellcasting.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack feature with its Charging Claw, capable of dealing significant slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Possessed ability allows transformation under certain conditions, making it challenging to eliminate.
senses: Darkvision enables it to see in dim light as if it were bright and in darkness as if it were dim light within 60 feet.
additional_information: Immune to charmed and frightened conditions.
Has a strong Chaotic and Evil aura.
Effective at tactical movement after attacks.
test_queries: chaotic evil humanoid with sharp claws
strong gnoll that can transform during combat
gnoll with high Dexterity in melee attacks
menacing gnoll that attacks multiple times
